wordpressPost.content:
Quality is our main aim. We promise beautiful flowers with a long lifespan. During our cultivation process we do everything we can to positively influence such quality. We do this through temperature, light, water, fertilizer, etc.

Every month we participate in a vase delivery test. This is done to check that longevity of our flowers is satisfactory. This allows us to keep a good track of quality and to intervene at the right time.

Consequently, we rarely receive comments from end customers. If a customer does have well-founded complaints, we work together to find an appropriate solution such as replacing the products with new ones or crediting the batch of flowers involved. More importantly:

we investigate together how problems arose and how we can improve the process.
